text: is one of the 23 special wards of Tokyo, Japan.Tokyo Metropolitan Government (TMG), "Municipalities within Tokyo" . Retrieved 2012-3-30. The municipality calls itself "Edogawa City" in English.City Official Homepage" . Retrieved 2012-3-30. ==Geography== Edogawa is in eastern Tokyo. It borders Tokyo Bay on the south. Kōtō and Sumida are on the west. Katsushika is on the northwestern border. On the east, the ward shares boundaries with the cities of Urayasu, Ichikawa and Matsudo in Chiba Prefecture. ==Related pages == * List of special wards of Tokyo * Capital of Japan ==References== ==Other websites== * Edogawa website , * Tokyo Metropolitan Government, Special wards Category:Wards of Tokyo Category:Settlements in Tokyo Prefecture
title: Edogawa, Tokyo
